description: Linear distance to the closest cemetery in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrieved from: Spatial points with the location of cemeteries, data from WB CPL dataset and OSM 2017.

Linear distance to the closest clinic in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrieved from: Spatial points with the location of clinics, data from WB CPL dataset and OSM 2017.

Linear distance to the closest cultural center in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrieved from: Point coordinates with the location of museums, landmarks, monuments, and tourist attractions, data from OSM 2017.

Linear distance to the closest mini bus (Angkutan) route in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrieved from: Spatial lines with Angkutan routes, data from WB CPL dataset and OSM 2017.

Linear distance to the closest Trans Sarbagita shelter in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrieved from: http://www.bali-backpacker.com/trans-sarbagita-bus-stop-halte-shelter/

Raw data retrived from: Spatial points with the location of commercial facilities, data from WB CPL dataset and OSM 
2017.

Linear distance to the closest green open space in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrived from: Spatial points with the location of urban parks, gardens, forests, and grasslands data from WB CPL dataset and OSM 2017.

Linear distance to the closest traditional market in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data provided by: Kota Denpasar DINAS Ekonomi, 2017.

Linear distance to the closest recreation facilities in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrived from: Spatial points with the location of recreation facilities such as community centers, sports facilities, bars, cinemas beaches and natural areas data from WB CPL dataset and OSM 2017.
Raster layer containing night lights radiance per pixel for the year 2015. Raw data was retrieved from National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) 2018.
Raster layer containing population number per pixel for the year 2015. Raw data was retrieved from Global Human Settlements (GHS) 2018.

Linear distance to the closest elementary school in meters. Distances were estimated using R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Raw data retrived from: Spatial points with the location of public elementary schools for Denpasar (WB CPL dataset ) and private and public elementary schools in the rest of the metropolitan area (OSM 2017).

Elevation in meters above the sea level. Elevation was computed with R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and the Package elevatr: Access Elevation Data from Various APIs version 0.1.4. Data service from Amazon Web Services elevation tiles.

Slope in values from 0 to 1. Slope was computed with R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) and  the Package Raster: Geographic Data Analysis and Modeling version 2.6-7. Specifically with the “terrain” function, which computes slope, aspect and other terrain characteristics from a raster with elevation data.
